sense.def:
Kadar dva človeka
synchronize something that they do
, delata nekaj hkrati in z enako hitrostjo.

seg.quote: They frequently synchronize their movements as they talk.
The rhythm was not synchronized with the pictures.

sense.def:
To synchronize two watches or clocks
pomeni nastaviti dve uri tako, da kažeta popolnoma isti čas.

seg.quote: His watch has been accurately synchronized with the church clock.
